# serval_team_user (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_team_user" "example_team_user" {
  team_id = "team_id"
  user_id = "user_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `team_id` (String)
- `user_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) A timestamp in RFC 3339 format (e.g., "2017-01-15T01:30:15.01Z").
- `role` (String) Available values: "TEAM_USER_ROLE_UNSPECIFIED", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_AGENT", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_MANAGER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_BUILDER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_VIEWER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_CONTRIBUTOR".
